RecordSelection.name: Best score
RecordSelection.description: Record with the best score after the pivot record

RecordSelection.name: Longest
RecordSelection.description: Record with most information (size). All fields (string data type) are taken into account except Data Quality (DQ) metadata. The length of a multi-value field is the length of longest element in the list.

RecordSelection.name: Most complete
RecordSelection.description: The record with fewest empty fields.

RecordSelection.name: Most complete and longest
RecordSelection.description: Record with the fewest empty fields and with the most information(size). All fields are taken into account except DQ metadata. Most complete takes priority over the longest.

RecordSelection.name: Most recently acquired
RecordSelection.description: The record with the latest timestamp managed through the DQ metadata tab.

RecordSelection.name: Most trusted source
RecordSelection.description: The record with most trusted source.

RecordSelection.name: Was golden
RecordSelection.description: The record is selected amongst 'Was golden' records and current 'Golden'. If many records with the 'Golden' or 'Was golden'Â identifier exist, the 'Most recently acquired' record is used.

SurvivorshipFunction.name: Best score
SurvivorshipFunction.description: The field value used is that of the record with the best score amongst all related suspects.

SurvivorshipFunction.name: Longest
SurvivorshipFunction.description: This field value is taken from the record with the biggest field value size (string). The length of a multi-value field is counted as the number of elements in the list.

SurvivorshipFunction.name: Max
SurvivorshipFunction.description: The field value used is the maximum value amongst all related suspects.

SurvivorshipFunction.name: Min
SurvivorshipFunction.description: The field value used is the minimum value amongst all related suspects.

SurvivorshipFunction.name: Most frequent
SurvivorshipFunction.description: The field value used is the value found most frequently amongst all related suspects.

SurvivorshipFunction.name: Most recently acquired
SurvivorshipFunction.description: The field value is taken from the last timestamps record.

SurvivorshipFunction.name: Most trusted source
SurvivorshipFunction.description: The field value is taken from the record with the best trusted source amongst all related clusters. If there are two sources with the same priority, the add-on will determine the most trusted based on latest timestamp. If this field is not declared in the 'Field trusted source' table, then the merge for this field is not executed.

SurvivorshipFunction.name: No merge
SurvivorshipFunction.description: The field value is not merged.
